strapiPost.title: Season Kick Off
strapiPost.content:
Ranked no.1 in the Southeastern Conference (SEC) preseason poll, the Women’s Razorback soccer team is looking to continue last season’s success in its 2021-2022 season. 

  • Tonight: The team kicks off its season tonight against no. 6 Duke’s Blue Devils at 6p in North Carolina, and you can be there in spirit with live stats. The Razorbacks beat the Blue Devils in the teams' last match in the 2016-2017 season 2-1.
  • Be on the lookout: The league office added six Hogs to the preseason watchlist, four of which received all-league honors for the third straight year. 

Keep up with the lady Razorback soccer schedule HERE.
